article:
There was a big tree in the forest. It was tall and   _ . Next to it was a small herb . One day, the big tree said, "I grow well. No one can  _  me." While the herb replied, "Dear friend, you shouldn't be so interested in yourself. Even the strongest tree will  _  one day." But the tree didn't listen to the herb and he continued to praise _  .
One night, a strong wind began to blow. It was so strong that almost _ was blown in the air.  _  the tree stood firmly . Then the  _  came. It rained heavily, however, the tree  _  stood strong. At the same time, the herb bowed low against the ground.  _  this, the tree began to make fun of the herb.
On another day, there was a storm in the  _ . The storm kept growing stronger and the tree finally fell down. When the storm  _  and everything was in silence, the herb stood straight. He  looked around  and found the fallen tree. Then he said, "Now you know  _ I told you is the truth."
We should realize that sometimes _  down doesn't mean you are not strong enough. It's a way of protecting yourself.
